issue.title: [CF 1637] Suggestion: add condition type: group size
issue.body:
It would be really nice if TMW can add an condition type of "group size" (compatible of both party and raid).

 

I know there is a "instance size" condition type existing.

But noticed that it only works based on "instance", which doesn't work for raid groups in worlds / maps outside of an "instance".

 

For example 1, the "instance size" is still and always 0 (zero) when I'm in a raid group of world boss, like dooms-howl in "Arathi Highlands"

And example 2, it seems to be 0 (zero) when I'm in some big scenario, like Stromgarde warfront scenario.

 


> Posted by CurseForge user doneykoo | Imported from CurseForge issue #1637 | Raw
